#summary Accessing the Dark Matter Examples project in SVN

Note: all examples are oriented towards an Eclipse development environment

 # In Eclipse select File->Import
 # Select Checkout Projects from SVN <br> <br> <img height="350" src="http://dark-matter-data.org/images/checkOutSVN.jpg"/>
 # Hit Next >
 # Select "Create a new repository location"
 # Enter the URL as: https://dark-matter-examples.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/
 # Select dark-matter-examples <br> <br> <img height="360" src="http://dark-matter-data.org/images/selectFolderSVN.png"/>
 # Hit Finish
 # The dark-matter-examples project should now be available in your package explorer.
